title.rendered: Haakon Brandrud  |  Director of Strategy and Corporate Development

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Haakon Brandrud has more than 12 years of Investment Banking experience from leading financial institutions and has worked on a wide range of M&A, equity and debt capital markets transactions. Before joining AqualisBraemar, Mr Brandrud was Director and Head of Energy Services at SB1 Markets. Mr Brandrud holds an MSc in Finance from NHH Norwegian School of Economics and Ivey Business School, University of Western Ontario. Mr Brandrud resides in Oslo, Norway.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1569484306855{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Contact

Oslo | +47 950 70 512

     

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

jetpack-related-posts.title: Synne Syrrist  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ms Syrrist is an independent business consultant, and has extensive experience as a non-executive director of both private and public companies.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yvonne Litsheim Sandvold  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ms Sandvold is the Chief Operating Officer of Frognerbygg AS, and has extensive experience from the Norwegian real estate industry.
